I‚Äôm particularly interested in how we regulate others‚Äô emotions in a variety of contexts: what representations are we drawing upon to respond to others? I enjoy learning from a variety of literatures to inform my research: emotion regulation, close relationships, mentalizing, attachment, development etc., and I am also curious about understanding these phenomena at the level of brain and behavior. As my interests evolve over time, the publications page may be helpful in offering a concrete sense of what I‚Äôve been thinking about.
